name: fibration
description: Welcome to Hedera's Rollup as a Service (RAAS) platform! This innovative solution empowers developers to create scalable, efficient, and compliant networks tailored to the modern multi-chain environment. Hedera RAAS overcomes the limitations of traditional, centralized Layer 2 designs by offering customizable smart contracts, fixed costs, and instant settlement options. Whether you're building a new decentralized ecosystem or enhancing an existing one, Hedera RAAS provides the tools you need to succeed.
author: german-rodikov
